## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(-5, -65)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -5, -65) that processes iron ore into iron plates.
- Connected to multiple wooden chests for resource storage.

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5) which requires water and fuel to generate electricity.
- Boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) that heats water to produce steam for the steam engine.
- Pipe groups connecting the boiler to the steam engine, but currently not operational due to missing connections.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) for extracting copper ore.
- Multiple wooden chests for storing resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting Boiler and Steam Engine
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler and Steam Engine. Check your inventory before attempting to connect.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Cannot place Offshore Pump if it is not in your inventory. Make sure to craft or gather the Offshore Pump before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target location.
